meanings.definition: Relating to the study of handwriting as a means of analyzing a person's character.
meanings.sent1: The expert provided a graphological analysis of the handwriting to understand the person's personality.
meanings.sent2: Her graphological skills helped her uncover hidden traits through handwriting analysis.
meanings.sent3: The detective used graphological techniques to solve the mystery of the forged signature.
meanings.sent4: The graphological examination revealed more about the writer than just words on paper.
meanings.sent5: The graphological study showed how handwriting can reveal secrets about a person.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the characteristics of a person's handwriting.
meanings.sent1: The graphological features of the letter indicated the writer's unique style.
meanings.sent2: His graphological quirks made his handwriting easily recognizable.
meanings.sent3: The graphological details in the note made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her graphological nuances added a personal touch to the written message.
meanings.sent5: The graphological elements of the script reflected the writer's emotions.

meanings.definition: Involving the analysis of handwriting for the purpose of determining personality traits.
meanings.sent1: She conducted a graphological to understand the person's character better.
meanings.sent2: The graphological revealed interesting insights into the individual's behavior.
meanings.sent3: The graphological at the party turned into a fun activity to guess personalities.
meanings.sent4: His graphological skills helped him assess people accurately through their handwriting.
meanings.sent5: The graphological session provided a fascinating look into the minds of the participants.
